title: goinstall does play well with cgo
body:
by **A.T.Sheehan**: 
When installing a package with goinstall that imports the "C" library,
goinstall does not recognize that the "C" library is a special import
statement for accessing C libraries.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. goinstall github.com/banthar/Go-SDL/sdl

What is the expected output?
A successful install

What do you see instead?
goinstall: C: open /home/adam/go/src/pkg/C: no such file or directory

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
GOOS=linux
GOARCH=386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
775c588abd3d tip
